page.title: 10MRS POTTIE (GOLLANFIELD)
page.content: Mrs. Pottie keeps{horses, goats and {hens.}She rents the fields out to people to put their horses in. In the summer all the girls go on the horses. Recently she got two new goats called Isla and Topaz; they are from a foreign country. Topaz had two kids both billies. She put one down because it wasnt useful for making products. Altogether she has got nine goats. She also is an artist and her paintings look as if they are real life. She mostly paints landscape. Mrs Pottie's husband is an architect and he designed the house.The house is an unusual shape; because of the dining room which is two storeys high Also there is a balcony, which sticks out in between the dining room and bedrooms.
